700769f-a.title: Bronx: Claremont Park - Zboroski Mansion.
700769f-a.text:
Claremont Park (Bronx): The 2boroski Mansion, built in 1859. It is situated at the northern end of the park and is now (1940) being used as the Bronx office of the Department of Parks.
1898
Gift of Hnndall Comfort
